website_summaries.verdict: A water purification tablet that provides greater protection than many other tablets on the market.
pros: The active ingredient in this tablet is effective against bacteria and viruses and is the only EPA approved active ingredient that is effective on cryptosporidium cysts, which can cause respiratory and gastrointestinal illness
One tablet can treat one quart of water and is good for campers and hikers as well as international travelers
cons: It is important to note that this product takes 4 hours to become fully effective, so you will need to plan ahead before using

customer_reviews.title: Expiration dates to close
customer_reviews.text: Received 2 packs expecting to see a 4 year expiration availability per the description. What I received has only 1 YEAR left. This is unacceptable in the way it is advertised and the cost at which is associated with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Radley

customer_reviews.title: Old Stock Increases Effective Cost
customer_reviews.text: If the useful life is 4 years from dater of manufacture this should be prominently marked -- but it is not. The box received Feb 14/2017 from Amazon has a sticky label with 15001 and "01/20". If the latter is an expiration date of Jan, 2020 then more than one fourth of the useful life is gone before receipt. The product may be good, but old stock raises the effective cost by one third (or one fourth, depending on how one calculates).
customer_reviews.author: KCC

customer_reviews.title: Old stock!
customer_reviews.text: We get the product with 11 month expiration day from receiving day! This product people usually buy for emergency (our case) with a long shelf time, at list 4 years, as indicated on the manufacturer’s website. We are really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ilana E

customer_reviews.title: These tabs are not only good for purifying water but they can also disinfect wounds ...
customer_reviews.text: These tabs are not only good for purifying water but they can also disinfect wounds and kill germs. Safe on skin when used at directed ratio. I use these to fight thrush and White Line in horses and donkeys. Same thing as White Lightening but much easier and cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF SHELF LIFE
customer_reviews.text: These tablets are great, however I just received my box to see that I am THREE YEARS into the four year guaranteed shelf life of these tablets. I'll make do since I use these for hiking in conjunction with a high quality water filter as an extra precaution for crypto, but if you are planning on storing these in case of emergency then I suggest you purchase direct from the manufacturer or another source.
customer_reviews.author: Parking Lot

customer_reviews.title: Expires 3/20... 16 months
customer_reviews.text: You absolutely have to check the expiration date on these. Mine show a exp date of 3/20 and were received 11/18/2018. That is only 16 months left on a 48 month lifespan. Not acceptable. The foil packs are stamped with the date but are a little hard to read. I had to call for a refund as these are on their 'no return' policy list. The refund was trouble free so I end up with free tablets good for 16 months I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Bell

customer_reviews.title: It actually doesn't taste bad
customer_reviews.text: I know that pretty much every company will say that on their product but this actually doesn't taste bad. There is slight chemical aftertaste but definitely not as bad as my tap water. The tablets are a bit big and overall quite heavy but I'm only getting sever of them as last resort big guns for those suspicious water sources that I won't be able to pass up.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Chlorine Dioxide
customer_reviews.text: It works for its unintended purpose the active ingredient chlorine dioxide has many uses. Information handed down in its uses.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Collins

customer_reviews.title: Burned a hole in my clean kanteen
customer_reviews.text: This tab burned a hole in my stainless steel water bottle. Scary. I drank a big glass of "treated water" and vomited. If you're traveling abroad maybe the dangerous water out weights the awful smell, taste and creepy burning capabilities. Not for use in most of America.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Actual shelf life too short
customer_reviews.text: Only one year of shelf life for the one I received. Versus 4 years advertised and what you pay for. A disapointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, effective
customer_reviews.text: Just used these on a backpacking trip in yosemite. Easy to use, convenient packaging. Slight chlorine taste to the water after treatment, but tasted better than many tap waters I’ve had previously. Also was able to resolve the awful plastic taste of a hydration reservoir I just bought. Only downside to chlorine tablets is the four hour duration it takes to work (as opposed to a UV pen or other filtration devices). But added benefit is that it works against cryptosporidium and viruses. Will buy these again for future backpacking trips.
customer_reviews.author: mag

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Worked out well for me as part of a filter/chemical treatment process on a backpacking trip. It says 4 hours and that seems a little extreme but I had enough water containers to allow it to take that long so it was no big deal for me. I also had no desire to test it it really needed 4 hours or not given the potential for problems. I didn't notice any strong after taste from them either which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Don't use any other disinfectant for your warer!
customer_reviews.text: One of the biggest problems you will face in disinfecting drinking water is cryptosporidium. There are very few ways to protect yourself, boil, super filter, or chlorine dioxide. Read the labels. If it doesn't say cryptosporidium it doesn't remove/kill it. By the way, cryptosporidium lives in 80% of the surface water in the US.
customer_reviews.author: polar

customer_reviews.title: Check the expiration date.
customer_reviews.text: I know the product is good, I didn’t like the fact that it was only good for 1 more year.
customer_reviews.author: R moreno

customer_reviews.title: Old Stock
customer_reviews.text: Item shelf life is shorter than should be expected. Manufacturer says 4 year shelf-life, but package indicates only 2 yrs. This means it's old stock, sitting on a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M

customer_reviews.title: Very packable
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet. Bought the 30 tab pack. Comes in 3 foil 10 tab cards. Each 10 pack is 2 1/4" by 6 1/2" about 3/32" thick and can separate into two tablets of 2 1/4" wide by 1 1/4". Takes 4 hours to treat the water yet worth it. In a survival situation the strong left over foil can be used to make fishing lures.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: No aftertaste. Nice to have on hand.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t notice any aftertaste. It dissolves pretty quickly. I drank a few glasses of it in clean water. I have not tried it on nasty water so cannot advise on it’s ability to actually kill germs.
customer_reviews.author: Oxymoran

customer_reviews.title: Bought these to sanitize my CamelBak, didn't want to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to sanitize my CamelBak, didn't want to pay their insane cost for chlorine dioxide tabs from CamelBak. Exact same product for a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: jack of all trades

customer_reviews.title: Short-dated
customer_reviews.text: Have not used as these are for emergencies. Rated 3 stars because they are short-dated. Expire in March 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Good backup for potable water
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in case we need to make water potable. Good just in case in our emergency kits. Hope to never have to use them, but will come in handy if we ever do.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mills

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my go bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because of reviews it for my go bag have not used them happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Gammies

customer_reviews.title: I hope to never need to use this
customer_reviews.text: This is for hiking and Puerto Rico type collapses of our water system. I will carry this on my wilderness hikes. I carry plenty of water, but if I have a problem and run out, I want to be able to make safe water. I reviewed several products and settled on this one.
customer_reviews.author: WGE G'Dad

customer_reviews.title: Individually wrapped - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Took to NZ and I am so glad I did! I went sea kayaking and the locals drank stream water. I played it safe and used the tablets while the other travelers suffered with stomach aches. The tablets are in self-contained packets, so you can keep a few with you at all times. Life saving!
customer_reviews.author: NVR STL

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: It is always a good idea to have several ways to purify or filter water in case of an emergency. Taking my own water, a water straw, and some of these tablets ensure that on a hike, if something happens, I have redundant ways to get clean water.
customer_reviews.author: Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: For grown children who are avid hikers, in case of emergency. Hope they never use them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Potable Aqua Chlorine Dioxide Tablets
customer_reviews.text: I used these on a long backpacking trip up in the Rocky Mountains. They worked great, I took water directly from several sources including a lake, stream, and pond. Fill up your bottle, drop in a tablet then wait a while and you'll have drinkable water. I'd recommend filtering the sediment out of the water with a scarf or strainer before placing it in your bottle. This method of purification was less involved then others although the wait time was longer. Everyone complains about the taste of Chlorine Dioxide, but honestly I didn't think it was that bad and I am used to normally drinking spring water. Great Purification technique!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: It's a water tablet...
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about them, as long as they work - and I don't die from bad water.
customer_reviews.author: Enzo

customer_reviews.title: The number of items you get when "buy again" is clicked.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product very much. It is helping to rid the toenail fungus quicker than anything else I have used. The delivery was fast. My only problem is, I was under the impression that when you click on "buy again" items; you get the same number of items not just one.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: I never got sick
customer_reviews.text: I used this for 2 weeks while hunting. I never got sick. How can I not give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brando

customer_reviews.title: best purifiaction tablets out there
customer_reviews.text: These are great - no chemical taste. Highly recommend for next mountain outing or hurricane preparedness kit.
customer_reviews.author: Mookie

customer_reviews.title: Shipping old stock
customer_reviews.text: Shipping old stock, expiration date 2/20.. receive 4 May 2018 ... what happened to the four years 🤑
customer_reviews.author: C A Davis

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and provides peace of mind in case of an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: but they come highly recommended. I am banking on not getting sick on ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not had an opportunity to use yet, but they come highly recommended. I am banking on not getting sick on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great product to have on hand in case of emergency
customer_reviews.text: I live in a hurricane prone area and do a lot of camping too. Great product to have on hand in case of emergency!
customer_reviews.author: C. Gall

customer_reviews.title: Good emergency purifier
customer_reviews.text: Boiling is always best. That said, sometimes boiling isn't an option. This is a good price for 30 tablets, but note that this requires 4 hours to kill cysts (and isn't 100 percent reliable then). So, pair with a straw filter.
customer_reviews.author: prepper10

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small, east to carry. Hope I don't ever run out of water and need it!
customer_reviews.author: NewMidwesterner

customer_reviews.title: Good water purifier
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to someone traveling to Africa --- apparently it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kimo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect number of tabs!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I've used iodine tabs before but they have a significant aftertaste. These are much better and kill viruses.
customer_reviews.author: Kendoist4162

customer_reviews.title: Home Emergency Kit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for our home emergency kit. Thankfully I haven't had to use them, but they were exactly what I was looking for and for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: V. Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hope never to need to use it but am glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, takes forever
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for scary water Taste is way better than iodine tetraglycine However, it takes a long time for the water to be consumed after treated
customer_reviews.author: Björn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product fits into my water bottle easy to use and disolve
customer_reviews.author: John Langevin

customer_reviews.title: Has worked well for me backpacking
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for water purification whole backpacking and have never had any trouble. I keep them in my home supplies in case I have to purify water after disaster. In reality, this is best used in combination with filtration. I would recommend waiting the amount of time given in the directions, then drinking the purified water through an activated charcoal filter to minimize the chlorine taste and remove chemical contaminants. That said, if you are only worried about bugs in the water, this should do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Water purification
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tablets to have as a back up in S.E. Asia. They work fine, but the water has an after taste. They met the requirment, although bottled water is available practically everywhere. Good as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Len

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good item, I just wish the packaging was a little tougher.
customer_reviews.author: Indeed

customer_reviews.title: Did it's job, but hard to get out of packaging
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I used these for water purification in the Ouachita Mountains and they worked great. The tablets are a little tough to get out of the individual packaging though and required quite a bit of effort to remove them. I would definitely recommend these for anyone though, we didn't get sick, what more can you ask?
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: In Colorado mountains I used these and only gave them ...
customer_reviews.text: In Colorado mountains I used these and only gave them 45 minutes and I didn't get sick on a 7 day camping trip. I'm considering taking them on a trip to india.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. No iodine color or taste. The chlorine taste dissipates over time.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are individual packaged. This is a great way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Maisto99

customer_reviews.title: Must have..
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit for the order to be processed, but once it was found and I confirmed I still wanted the item it was shipped and received much faster than I thought possible. Great item for backup water treatment for just about anything you can think of.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Very practical for backpacking (in the short term at least)
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of these for treating water in the backcountry. After a ton of use, my favorite ratio I've stumbled upon is 1 tablet / 32 FL OZ (Gatorade bottle [946 ML]). That's when I'm in the mountains in the Pacific Northwest and not worried about the safety of the water so much. Totally a qualitative thing here. But seems like a good balance of treatment to exposure to Chlorine Dioxide, considering all chemical treatments are likely bad for your health in the long run. Nonetheless, I'm pretty addicted to how lightweight and fast-to-use these are when backpacking.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Potable Aqua Tablets completely removed the chlorine taste from our water!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Potable Aqua Chlorine Dioxide tablets
customer_reviews.text: The Potable Aqua Chlorine Dioxide tablets were very reasonable in price and arrived earlier than the expected date. On arrival, they were well packaged and arrived undamaged. They are now being used to treat drinking water in Ghana, West Africa to make the water potable. When this product is again needed, I have saved the paperwork and hope to use the same company. Thank you for your prompt and efficient service.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Naples

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They worked well and we didn't get sick after drinking glacier water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I received this item on time and everything was fine with it. I have yet to use it so as for the taste and such, I cannot comment on.
customer_reviews.author: Kevie

customer_reviews.title: Sealed nicely
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to test them out, but the packaging is good, and having used this brand in the past you can't really go wrong with this water treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Davison Schanno

customer_reviews.title: Better safe than sick
customer_reviews.text: We are taking a trip out of the country and I wanted something to help keep us from getting sick if we have to use local water sources. I've read and heard to even be wary of some bottled waters. This product has a great reputation so I feel better prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Semper Fi

customer_reviews.title: They look nice.. I hope to never have to use ...
customer_reviews.text: They look nice ..I hope to never have to use them..We got them just in case..
customer_reviews.author: Patric

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: They take 4 hours to work, require darkness and it tastes awful. Save your money and research the pills that only take 30 minutes. Or get the steri-pen instead.
customer_reviews.author: K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good backup plan
customer_reviews.text: Can't provide an adequite review until actual use. Purchased only as an emergency item in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: MarbleI

customer_reviews.title: Takes four hours to work
customer_reviews.text: Failed to note before purchasing that it takes four hours for this product to work! Does it say that in the description?
customer_reviews.author: P.

customer_reviews.title: Takes four hours to work. Their are other products ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes four hours to work. Their are other products that take 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Redeyes

customer_reviews.title: 4hr treatment time! Didn't notice that when ordering!
customer_reviews.text: 4hr treatment time! Didn't notice that when I ordered. Who has 4hrs to sit around waiting for the treated water when they also make a 30min variety? Not sure if there is a price difference but who cares... I had to go to REI to buy the 30min type before my Yosemite trip. Luckily didn't end up needing them anyways but better safe than sorry when out hiking in places with limited water.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Kronk

product_meta.title: Potable Aqua Chlorine Dioxide Water Purification Tablets - 30 Count
product_meta.description: Wherever life takes you, never be without clean drinking water when you have Potable Aqua Chlorine Dioxide Water Purification Tablets on hand. These water purification tabs are effective against viruses, bacteria and cysts such as Giardia lamblia and Cryptosporidium, and the water purification tablets for drinking leave behind no aftertaste. Add water purifying tablets to one quart (one liter) of contaminated water, and allow four hours of treatment time for suitable drinking water in emergency situations. The combination of active ingredients in the Potable water tablets react in water to create chlorine dioxide, a powerful disinfectant that meets EPA microbilogical purifier standards to make questionable water safe to drink. The drinking water treatment tablets are individually wrapped for easy chlorine dioxide water treatment for camping, hiking and travel. Pop emergency water purification tablets into an opaque bottle for water treatment for drinking water with improved taste.
feature_bullets: One pack of 30 Potable Aqua Chlorine Dioxide Water Purification Tablets for Drinking
Water purifying tablets are effective against bacteria, viruses and cysts, such as Giardia lamblia and Cryptosporidium as a chlorine dioxide water treatment
Water purification tabs offer water treatment for drinking water for camping, hiking, traveling and emergency preparedness situations
Drinking water treatment tablets take 4 hours to purify one quart (one liter) of water for emergency water purification
Potable water tablets with 2.6 times the oxidizing capacity of chlorine

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
